detailsOfAchievement: M/S Roshan Art Centre Pinjoora Tangmarg Kashmir About the Group: Roshan Art Centre Pinjoora Tangmarg was established in 1995 to promote and preserve Kashmiri culture and create public awareness in society about the social evils, problems through theatre in rural and remote areas of Kashmir. The group has been participating in major festivals of the country like Bharat Rang Maha utsav of NSD, National theatre festival of Kerela, Nandikaar, and National theatre festival of Kolkata, 15th Kalinga Natya Maha utsav Udisha and in all the theatre festival of Jammu and Kashmir. The group has won many awards in 2009 theatre festival of Kashmir like as,2nd best production,2nd best director, best music, best costume, best actor female and many consolation prices for the play (Arche-Kaal).In 2013 the group has again 2nd best production,2nd best director, 2nd best actor male, best music, best lighting ,and many consolation prices .In the present day scenario M/S Roshan Art Centre has been working day night for the purpose the revaluation cultural activities in the turmoil hit Kashmir. The group has earned a good fame under the leading guidance of its director-Reshi Rashid.

detailsOfAchievement: The aim of the society is to help and provide care to the underprivileged children at present there are more than 600 children who are getting education and day meal in center and associated schools Till date more than 13000 underprivileged children have been benefited under the purview of the society for the last two and half decades Our main aim is to give such children an opportunity for participation in the educational system of the country With out 27 years experience of work in the slums of Jammu city we will be able to divert children from begging and child labour to formal education through non formal educational bridge education We provide vocational trainings and counselling of the parents of the children Working without any assistance from any Government we are proud of some of the children who have been diverted from beggary child labour and balloon sellers to get formal education in the mainstream of education system of the country

Our organisation conduts several awareness camps of foeticide, female sec ratio diminishing, awareness on National interated, communal harmony, child - Labour,Dowery etc . in order to create awareness amongst the masses with special focus on women. 5.our organistaion has provided computer education to so many boys and girls on a nominal fee to facilitate them to get computer education easily. 6. our organisation has made a base-line survey on the gross route level in District Baramulla and identified 1000 artisans in different Arts & crafts in handicratfs sector, and formulated a big project under the AHVY- Baba Ambedkar Hastshilip yojna and was submitted to Development Commissioner (Handicrafts) Ministry of Texttiles, Govt of India, New Delhi, Which has been Sanctioned by DCH-New Delhi Vide Their letter no : C-12011/24/2013-14-CC(NR)-1/17531 Dated 24.06.2014.
